property.name: mapreduce.map.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores required for each map task.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores required for each reduce task.

property.name: mapreduce.map.gpu.vcards
property.description: The number of GPU cards required for each map task.

property.name: mapreduce.map.hsa.vsets
property.description: The number of HSA sets required for each map task.

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
property.description: the size to use while sorting map output

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.input.buffer.percent
property.description: the proportion of total heap size to be used for retaining map outputs in memory during reduce

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.merge.inmem.threshold
property.description: the number of map outputs for starting the process of merging the outputs and spilling to disk

property.name: mapreduce.job.reduce.slowstart.completedmaps
property.description: Fraction of the number of maps in the job which should be complete before reduces are scheduled for the job. Value is 1.0 meaning reduces start after all maps finish.
